  • Class
    Description
    Assistant
    Represents informations about an assistant in a game, like if it has been already played in the current round
    AssistantName
    Enumeration of every possible assistant with his priority and mother nature moves
    Bag
    Bag containing all the students of the game
    Cloud
    Cloud which contains students for the player to take at the end of every round
    Color
    Enumeration of the colors of the students
    DiningRoom
    Represents the dining room of a player.
    EndGameObserver
    Class used to notify the EndObserver and handle the end game logic
    EndObserver
    Interface that represents object which can observe other objects to understand if the game is ended
    Entrance
    Represents the enrance of a player
    Game
    The container of all the elements of the game
    GameComponent
    Enumeration of the main components of the game
    InfluenceStrategy
    Interface of classes which can determines how to calculate influence on islands ( strategy pattern ).
    Island
    Class representing a single island or more island connected together
    IslandsManager
    Contains every island of the game and manages every operation regarding them, like unite multiple islands.
    Phase
    Enumeration of the phases of the game
    Player
    Represents a player of the game containing every component related to him, like playerboard, choices and assistant deck
    PlayerBoard
    Manage the entrance, the dining room and the towers of a player.
    PlayerChoice
    Manages all the choices made by a player regarding the activation of character cards
    PlayerHand
    Manages the deck of the player containing assistant cards
    ProfessorManager
    Manages professors ownership and acquisition
    StandardInfluence
    Standard strategy to evaluate players influence on islands
    TowerColor
    Enumeration of every possible color of towers
